attributes.action: Use sanctions to ensure Donald Trump can never control US nukes
attributes.background: Various countries, including the UK and EU, worked hard to ensure Iran can never get nuclear weapons.  There is a real risk that if Donald Trump is elected he will get control of US nuclear weapons.  Many people find this more scary than the thought of Iran gaining nuclear capability.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling on the Government to call upon the US Government to scrap its nuclear weapons.
